programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Trophy, Part 1'' - Eddie is arrested for statutory rape after a teenage girl lies about seducing him in his tower. Meanwhile, Eric Turner, bitter about the paralyzing accident he suffered as a lifeguard, returns to Baywatch to reconcile his relationship with Megan.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''The Trophy, Part 2'' - Eddie is suspended from Baywatch over the statutory rape charge. He feels abandoned when no one believes his innocence pleas. Meanwhile, the reckless, paraplegic Turner, wanting to win Megan back, tries to impress her by hang-gliding off a cliff.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''River of No Return, Part 1'' - The mysterious death of Mitch's uncle, and the cryptic will he left, finds Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, and Shauni on a whitewater rafting adventure. Meanwhile, rookie lifeguard hopefuls participate in the annual qualifying swim.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''River of No Return, Part 2'' - A whitewater rafting trip turns deadly when Mitch, Hobie, Eddie, Shauni and CJ are pursued by the murderous miners that killed Mitch's uncle to get his map leading to the "Golden Boot" that Mitch and the others are now searching for.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Vacation, Part 1'' - The Baywatch lifeguards set sail on a romantic cruise, only to encounter a dangerous fugitive, who forces Mitch and Stephanie overboard into the stormy Pacific Ocean.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Vacation, Part 2'' - While on a vacation cruise, the Baywatch lifeguards encounter high seas hijackers, leaving Mitch and Stephanie stranded in the stormy Pacific, and Summer, Matt, CJ and Guido faced with outwitting ruthless killers who have overtaken the ship.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Shattered, Part 1'' - When he risks his life to save three teenagers, Mitch fractures his spine and is paralyzed. Hobie, Stephanie, and Sophie, his physical therapist, rally to repair his shattered life.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Shattered, Part 2'' - Paralyzed during a heroic rescue, Mitch undergoes a vigorous rehabilitation regimen. Meanwhile, Jason, a ten-year old paraplegic, is pursued by a hit man trying to keep him from testifying against gangsters.

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Race Against Time, Part 1'' - Mitch's ex-wife flies in for a weekend visit. She introduces her new fiancé Ken and informs Mitch she is taking Hobie back to Ohio with her. When Ken's private jet crashes in the ocean on takeoff, the Baywatch team have to rescue them!

programme.title: Baywatch
programme.desc: ''Race Against Time, Part 2'' - A dramatic plane crash finds Hobie and his mother trapped in the rapidly flooding fuselage beneath the sea while Mitch and the Baywatch lifeguards mount a massive rescue effort to save the trapped passengers and crew.

programme.title: Galapagos: Darwin's Eden

programme.title: Sri Lanka: Monsoon Island
programme.desc: A teardrop in the Indian Ocean, Sri Lanka is an island that defies convention. Poised just six degrees above the equator, it’s less than 75,000 km sq in size with enough wildlife to rival continents.

programme.title: The Hebrides: Land of Legends
programme.desc: The Hebrides archipelago is made up of more than 500 islands and islets, lying just off the coast of west Scotland. Isolation has made it the perfect breeding ground for millions of creatures.

programme.title: Japan: Islands of Extremes

programme.title: Surviving in the Lagoon
programme.desc: In the heart of the Pacific, between the lagoon and the ocean, unrolls one of Nature’s greatest spectacles. This is the story of a little surgeon fish who will have to go through the greatest ordeals from the moment he is born. He will survive the greatest dangers and cross paths with the ocean’s worst predators. Only one out of a million will make it to adulthood. Filmed in UHD and extreme slow motion, this film captures exclusive wildlife behavior of sharks, whales, manta rays, groupers, and more.

programme.desc: Dr. Duck and Billy Campbell continue their freelance trip in the Dakotas. There's an abundance of water, which has the mallards spread out in potholes and flooded fields. In this episode, a couple area students take advantage of a day off from school to share a memorable day in the field with the crew.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E5 "Chasing a Milk River Giant | Bowhunting Montana Whitetails"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan heads to Montana, which is one of his favorite trips of the year. The Milk River is a very special place to the Realtree crew, and it doesn't take long before they spot a giant. Will they close the distance? Find out now.

programme.title: Road Trips S1:E6 "Legendary Whitetail Falls | Spot and Stalking on the Milk River"
programme.desc: Tyler Jordan heads back to the Milk River in hopes of catching up with a buck they call “Hightower." After spotting the buck from 400 yards away, Jordan decides to plan a spot-and-stalk effort to get in range of it. Crawling through the snow in frigid temperatures proved the right decision, and was well worth it.

programme.title: RMEF S4:E14 "Clair"
programme.desc: Volunteers are the heart of the Rocky Mountain Elk Foundation and Clair Harris is the quintessential example. A volunteer since its inception in 1984, he accumulated more than 7,000 hours volunteering for RMEF’s Flagstaff Arizona Chapter. His motivation is simple - help wildlife and protect it for future generations. His reward is the simple satisfaction that he has done so. Follow along as Clair hunts the Express UUBar in New Mexico for a management bull and reflects on a lifetime of volunteering.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Kabir Singh - Retiring Material
programme.desc: Energetic and in-your-face comedian Kabir Singh jokes about why serial killers are white, Indian stereotypes, and why Siri's racist.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: John Deming - Sadder Than Most Horses
programme.desc: John Deming uses his sarcastic observational comedy to joke about working as a student debt collector, college ethics classes, and paying for his groceries with dimes.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Tony Deyo - Sleep When The Baby Sleeps
programme.desc: Tony Deyo is a stand-up comedian known most notably for his sharp, quick material and near-perfect comedic timing almost certainly gained from his years as a professional symphony musician. New York City’s Village Voice calls him “one of the tightest joke writers in the business.” In 2013, he made his late night television debut on CONAN. Within a year, he had added appearances on The Late Late Show with Craig Ferguson, AXS TV’s Gotham Comedy Live, and Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen. His latest album, Comedy Road Trip, landed on the Billboard Magazine comedy chart and debuted as the #1 selling stand-up album on iTunes. With over 50 stand-up clips available, he has steadily become one of the most prolific comedians on YouTube. He performed at the prestigious HBO Aspen Comedy Festival, was named one of the year's best by the New York Post, and can be heard regularly on SiriusXM Satellite Radio.

programme.title: Don Friesen - Live In Provo
programme.desc: Husband. Idiot. Dad. His kids think he's fun. His wife thinks he's an idiot. Audiences think he's hilarious! Don is a modern suburban dad just trying to raise his kids and get through the day with a bit of money in the bank and a scrap of dignity intact. With a unique style that can best be described as frenetic and engaging, Don captures the irony of parenting, marriage and everyday absurdities through characters, voices, parodies and some of the best written routines around. He's a wanna-be geek who constantly upgrades to the latest technology, but can never get it to work, leading to signature bits about tech support, Idiots Guides, texting and passwords. Friesen has recently taken his smart, savvy, and highly-caffeinated comedy to the stage at the Alex Theatre in Glendale, CA, for the taping of his new Showtime one-hour special titled "Ask Your Mom." In his first nationally released concert special, Don delivers a winning hour of clever, true-to-life "he's talking about my family up there" comedy that manages to be adult-smart yet family-friendly.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Jordan Makin - The BFFG
programme.desc: Born and raised in the heart of Utah County, Jordan Makin had to compensate for his red hair and uneventful childhood by learning to be funny. His unique observations will make you laugh and his stories about feeling awkward will help you appreciate your life more. He has worked with many comedy greats, such as Marc Maron, Ryan Hamilton, and Drew Lynch. His comedy has been featured at the Finger Lakes Comedy Festival and the Idaho Laugh Fest. Jordan is the co-creator and co-host of The Happy Valley Podcast.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Michael Palascak - 1984
programme.desc: Michael Palascak's dry humor shines with riffs on interviewing for a pyramid scheme, living with his parents after college, and how life is way better now than in 1984.

programme.title: Dave Burleigh - Nobody's Keeping You Here
programme.desc: Comedian and Impressionist Dave Burleigh's star is on the rise. His uncanny ability to impersonate just about anyone landed him the starring role as Charlie Sheen in "Not Another Celebrity Movie." Burleigh's multiple characters, voices, and impressions were showcased on Season 7 of America's Got Talent, where he became a fast favorite of both judges and fans alike. Judge Howard Stern said, "You have an excellent command of the stage." Fellow comedian and judge Howie Mandel added, "Your impressions were spot on." Burleigh's laid back and easy going style and persona on stage contrasted with his unique facial and body expressions are guaranteed to leave audiences amazed and impressed. As a two-time finalist in the San Francisco Comedy Competition, Burleigh now shares the first runner-up spot with past participant comedy legends like Robin Williams, Ellen DeGeneres, Marc Maron, Dane Cook and Kevin Pollak. With numerous television, podcast and radio appearances, prestigious publications like Rolling Stone are talking, "Burleigh has the trappings of a soon to be comedy star!" This talented, singer, musician, actor, comedian and host tours the world over 36 weeks a year and headlines all the major casinos in Las Vegas. Make sure to catch Dave's show at a theater or comedy club near you, as he will no doubt, leave you with a lasting impression.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Josh Blue - The Disabled List
programme.desc: Following his groundbreaking win on NBC’s Last Comic Standing in 2006, Josh Blue has risen through the ranks to become a well-established headliner at venues throughout the world.

programme.title: Andy Beningo - Adorable Tough Guy
programme.desc: Over the past decade, Andy Beningo has established himself as one of the hardest working comedians in the business. Performing his clever, "every man" material has led to some 2,700 career performances. Along the way, he has appeared on AXS Gotham Comedy Live, as a final four finalist on CMT's Next Big Comic, and on the Bob and Tom radio show. Beningo's new CD regularly plays on Laugh USA on XM Sirius Radio. He's been hailed for his clean comedy, and was named one of the 40 Best Up and Coming Comedians in the country. He was also named "Best Comedian" by both the Detroit Metro Times and Detroit Hour magazine.

programme.title: Erica Rhodes - I Love You More
programme.desc: Erica Rhodes is a regular panelist on Comedy Central’s @midnight and Fox’s Punchline. She has made appearances on SeeSo’s The Guest List, Hulu’s Coming to the Stage, AXS’ Live at Gotham and the syndicated Comics Unleashed. Erica has performed at San Francisco Sketchfest, the Moontower Comedy Festival (Austin, TX), the Blue Whale Comedy Festival (Tulsa, OK), the Boston Comedy Festival and RIOT LA Fest. Recent TV credits include ABC’s Modern Family, HBO’s Veep, Fox’s New Girl, and IFC’s Comedy Bang Bang. Erica stars in Audible’s Dr. Katz: The Audio Files and ABC Digital’s The Off Season. She recurs on TruTV’s Fameless and has been a semi-regular performer/writer on NPR’s A Prairie Home Companion.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Drew Barth - Shoulda Tried Harder
programme.desc: Drew Barth is one of the fastest rising comedy stars in the Northwest. Born just outside the city of Seattle, what started as a dare in high school has become a full-time career. Drew Barth has risen through the ranks of local open mics to become a regular performer at comedy clubs, colleges, casinos and private events up and down the West Coast. After making the finals of the Seattle International Comedy Competition, Drew Barth spent a great deal of time in Los Angeles performing at clubs such as The Comedy Store, Laugh Factory, and The Improv, honing his craft.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: Chelle T - It Just Got Real
programme.desc: As a mother of seven, Chelle T has seen it all, and shes not afraid to joke about it. Quippy and honest, Chelle T talks about how children are raised differently these days, menopause, being married for twenty-three years, and how desperate you sometimes become when youre a mom in this special.

programme.title: Dry Bar Comedy: DC Benny - You Don't Look Funny
programme.desc: Benny lives in Brooklyn where he fiddles around with old Land Rovers when he is supposed to be helping his wife run her natural skincare business. He has a dog named Grits and two cats who prefer that he not share their personal information in this bio.

Together, they discover the real reason everyone is sick, and attempt to stop the illness - with the help of the machine's powerful technology and weaponry.

programme.title: Battle of Los Angeles

programme.desc: The brainchild of controversial Nikola Tesla, High-Frequency Active Aural Research Project (H.A.A.R.P.) is a combined effort of the Air Force and Navy ostensibly designed to influence the weather.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E4 | American Midnight

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E6 | Heavy Watergate: The War Against Cold Fusion
programme.desc: In 1989, two respected chemists made an announcement that rocked the world of science. Their experiments with heavy water yielded enormous amounts of heat energy, now known as cold fusion.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E7 | Noah's Ark Found?
programme.desc: In 1960, a joint US-Turkish expedition sets out to investigate the aerial sighting of a boat-shaped object located in eastern Turkey. Could this be the mortal remains of the legendary Noah's Ark?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E8 | Monopoly Men

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E9 | Lost Lightning: The Missing Secrets of Nikola Tesla
programme.desc: At the end of the 19th century, a race was on to power the world. Caught in the crossfire was inventor Nikola Tesla, who claimed he could provide everyone with free, unlimited energy. Was it true?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E10 | Tunguska: The Russian Roswell
programme.desc: Just prior to the Russian Revolution, a mysterious explosion occurred in the desolate northlands of Siberia. Was it an asteroid? Or could it have been the explosion of an extraterrestrial craft?

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E11 | Stolen Glory: The Cover-up of Cosmonaut Vladimir Ilyushin
programme.desc: With the collapse of communism and the rise of freedom in the Russian Federation, recent access to documents in the Kremlin archives reveal a story intended to remain buried forever.

programme.title: Phenomenon: The Lost Archives, S1 E12 | Science Fraud: Is the Tail Wagging the Dog?
programme.desc: The cold fusion debacle and the discovery of the Piltdown man stand as two of the greatest shams in history. Have scientists learned anything from the real or alleged goldbricks of the past?
